Title: Inuwari-san
Description: ['The pilot of ', Inuwari-san, ", it was originally meant to be a TV series before being canceled. The pilot was screened at the 2009 Tokyo International Anime Fair and developed as part of Miyagi Prefecture's Miyagi e-Brand Establishment Support Project.", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Inuwari-san is a canine (inu) police officer (omawari-san) who loves law, order, and tea. Inuwari-san vows to be the infalliable "sweeper of evil." ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN)']
